thread.title: Euro zone: data deepens debate over ECB outlook

title: Euro zone: data deepens debate over ECB outlook
text:
Euro zone: data deepens debate over ECB outlook 7:06pm IST - 01:27 
Foreign trade drove a robust expansion in Europe's largest economy between October and December, German data showed on Friday, but euro zone consumer price growth is confirmed to have slowed slightly in January. David Pollard reports.   
Foreign trade drove a robust expansion in Europe's largest economy between October and December, German data showed on Friday, but euro zone consumer price growth is confirmed to have slowed slightly in January. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2EMABXS
